H0.text: phase change from gas to solid is called. Condensation

H1.text: phase change from gas to solid is called. Crystallization

H2.text: phase change from gas to solid is called. Solidification

H3.text: phase change from gas to solid is called. Deposition

A4.text: Deposition is the phase transition in which gas transforms into solid without passing through the liquid phase.

A5.text: Deposition releases energy and is an exothermic phase change.
